GMIT supports the development of talented athletes and recognises their increasing need to successfully balance both academic and sporting commitments. GMIT facilitates this vision through the Sports Scholarship Programme.

Who can apply?
GMIT Sports Scholarships are available to incoming first years.
Scholarships may be awarded for any sport once the individual has/is competing and performing at International, National, Inter-provincial, Inter-county and/or Senior Club level
Students must meet the GMIT admission requirements through the CAO system and must have registered on a programme of academic study at GMIT

Benefits of Sports Scholarship at GMIT:
The aim of the Sports Scholarship Program at GMIT is to aid the continuous development of talented athletes both in a sporting and educational sense.
Sports Scholarship Recipients will receive the following;Financial Assistance, Developmental aids such as, physio, sports nutrition advice, sports psychology assistance, strength and conditioning, coaching courses and mentoring. Scholarship recipients will also receive gym membership and scholarship branded clothing.
